data.name: ErrorNoGroupSelected
data.value: Please select a target group before approving.

data.name: ErrorScriptNameNoPath
data.value: Script name must not include path segments.

data.name: ErrorScriptNameNotPs1
data.value: Script name must reference a .ps1 file.

data.name: ErrorClipboardFailed
data.value: Failed to copy to clipboard. Please try again.

data.name: ConfirmBulkDecline
data.value: Decline {0} selected updates? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: ErrorNoReport
data.value: No report available. Generate a report first.

data.name: ConfirmDeleteGroup
data.value: Delete group '{0}'? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: ErrorGroupHasComputers
data.value: Cannot delete group with computers. Move computers first.

data.name: DialogMoveComputerPrompt
data.value: Enter the target group name. Available groups: {0}

data.name: ConfirmRemoveComputer
data.value: Remove '{0}' from WSUS? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: ConfirmRestoreSettings
data.value: Restoring settings will overwrite appsettings.json. Continue?

data.name: DialogAuthSetupMessage
data.value: Authentication is enabled by default. Configure administrator and operator groups to match your environment.

data.name: DialogAuthSetupFollowup
data.value: Review the Security tab to confirm authentication settings and group membership.

data.name: ConfirmDeclineUpdate
data.value: Decline update '{0}'? This cannot be undone.

data.name: ConfirmStartSync
data.value: Start WSUS synchronization? This may take several minutes.

data.name: ErrorUnauthorized
data.value: You are not authorized to perform this action.

data.name: ErrorConnectionFailed
data.value: Failed to connect to WSUS server.

data.name: ErrorCircuitBreakerOpen
data.value: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

data.name: ConfirmDeclineSelectedUpdates
data.value: Decline {0} selected updates? Declined updates will not be offered to any computer.

data.name: TipSuperseded
data.value: This update has been superseded by a newer update. Consider declining it.

data.name: TipNotApproved
data.value: This update has not been approved for any group.

data.name: ConfirmDeclineSuperseded
data.value: Decline {0} superseded updates? These updates have been replaced by newer versions.

data.name: ConfirmApproveCritical
data.value: Approve {0} unapproved critical updates for group '{1}'?

data.name: ConfirmApproveSecurity
data.value: Approve {0} unapproved security updates for group '{1}'?

data.name: RulesDescription
data.value: Create rules to automatically approve or decline updates based on conditions.

data.name: TooltipSearch
data.value: Search updates by title or KB number

data.name: ConfirmDeclineSupersededCount
data.value: Decline {0} superseded updates? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: ToastSettingsImported
data.value: Settings restored. Restart the app to apply changes.

data.name: TooltipHealthIndicator
data.value: WSUS server health status - click Refresh to update

data.name: CleanupWindowDescription
data.value: Select cleanup tasks to run against the WSUS server.

data.name: EmailBodyCriticalUpdates
data.value: Critical updates have been pending for {0} days. Please review the approval queue.

data.name: EmailBodyComplianceLow
data.value: Compliance is currently at {0:F1}%, which is below the configured threshold.

data.name: EmptyStateUpdates
data.value: No updates available. Click Refresh to load data.

data.name: EmptyStateComputers
data.value: No computers found. Verify connection and click Refresh.

data.name: EmptyStateGroups
data.value: No groups available. Create a group to get started.

data.name: EmptyStateRules
data.value: No approval rules defined. Create a rule to automate approvals.

data.value: Connect to a WSUS server first
